explains: adj. 丰富的；慷慨的；宽大的

sentences.en: The land is bountiful and no one starves.
sentences.cn: 这片土地产量很高，无人挨饿。

sentences.en: State aid is less bountiful than it was before.
sentences.cn: 国家援助没有从前那么多。

sentences.en: It would be an egregious error to equate the monopolistic producer with bountiful expenditures on research.
sentences.cn: 把垄断生产商等同于研究上的大量支出，将是一个极其严重的错误。
